wybug_title: 腾讯游戏小小夜店存在敏感信息泄露漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-03-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2011-03-22：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2011-04-01：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2011-04-11：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2011-04-21：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2011-04-21：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 可能是服务器应用配置错误，导致服务器敏感信息泄露。 详细说明：  今天在玩腾讯游戏《小小夜店》，顺便检测了一下。发现敏感信息泄露，希望尽快处理。   漏洞证明：  
Warning: main() [function.main]: It is not safe to rely on the system's timezone settings. You are *required* to use the date.timezone setting or the date_default_timezone_set() function. In case you used any of those methods and you are still getting this warning, you most likely misspelled the timezone identifier. We selected 'Asia/Chongqing' for 'CST/8.0/no DST' instead in /usr/local/services/WebServer/hp_apps/web_root/index.php on line 51Notice: Undefined variable: view in /usr/local/services/WebServer/hp_apps/web_root/index.php on line 51Warning: main() [function.main]: It is not safe to rely on the system's timezone settings. You are *required* to use the date.timezone setting or the date_default_timezone_set() function. In case you used any of those methods and you are still getting this warning, you most likely misspelled the timezone identifier. We selected 'Asia/Chongqing' for 'CST/8.0/no DST' instead in /usr/local/services/WebServer/hp_apps/web_root/index.php on line 51Fatal error: Call to a member function display() on a non-object in /usr/local/services/WebServer/hp_apps/web_root/index.php on line 51
   修复方案：  无   版权声明：转载请注明来源 webshell@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：低 漏洞Rank：1  确认时间：2011-03-22 09:38 厂商回复： thanks 最新状态： 暂无
